attributes.action: Fund Steiner Waldorf Schools in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Steiner Schools here in the UK are not funded by the state, as they cover an alternative curriculum.
Help enable them to be free for our children to attend, by petitioning the Prime Minister to fund Steiner Schools in the UK, without changing the curriculum itself.
Our children should have the rights to a brilliant wholesome education without our families falling apart financially, in order for them to stay there all the way from 4 year olds to 18 year olds.
Please help!

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Steiner-Waldorf/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
